Author: Skoll
Winchester rifle
https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/winchester-rifle.html
info.description: Cautious not to give ammunition to anti-gun lobbyists with yet another shooting accident, hunters start congregating together and at a safe distance from other packs. But the decrease of quality alone time gives rise to their ego, and their sense of self-worth is now tied to family status. They need others to look down onto, and thus can't allow everyone to take part in the most epic chases. Just enough people to spread the tale.
